solution_line_template: He total temperature for the week is {total_temperature_stated_L1} because {sunday_temp} plus {monday_temp} plus {tuesday_temp} plus {wednesday_temp} plus {thursday_temp} plus {friday_temp} plus {saturday_temp} equals {total_temperature_stated_L1}.

His average temperature is {average_temperature} degrees because {total_temperature_for_average} divided by {num_days_in_week} equals <<{total_temperature_for_average}/{num_days_in_week}={average_temperature}>>{average_temperature}.
